definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)
to pour wine/to drink wine/to deliberate/to consider

sentences.english: After you think it over- pleottom let me know by fax.
sentences.chinese: 你仔細商酌過之後，請用傳真相告。

sentences.english: The scheme is now under deliberation.
I would have to take issue with that last point of yours.
sentences.chinese: 我要對你的最後一個觀點進行商酌。

sentences.english: We are thinking of making a new plan for the next term.
sentences.chinese: 我們正商酌爲下學期制定新的計劃。

sentences.english: This measure needs further discussion and consideration.
In developing the design, we must consider the feasibility of processing.
sentences.chinese: 在進行設計時，必須商酌加工的可能性。

sentences.english: I hold an optimistic view of events.
sentences.chinese: 我看事情角力較量商酌達觀。

sentences.english: In fact, don't bother thinking about it.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，不要多度去商酌。

sentences.english: In case of any difficulty, you must consult with the masses.
sentences.chinese: 要是碰着難題，你應該和大衆商酌。

definition: to discuss/to bring up various ideas for discussion
to reach an agreement/to agree upon
to do as one thinks fit/to handle by taking circumstances into consideration
to handle in accordance with (the rules)
this is no small thing (idiom)/to have a serious matter at hand
